title: Oliver Smith Jeweler Website
description: An e-commerce platform for Oliver Smith Jeweler, featuring a custom Shopify theme. The site includes a product catalog. Built with Shopify Liquid, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a seamless shopping experience across devices.

title: WatchWeek Website App
description: An RSVP system designed specifically for WatchWeekAspen, allowing guests to securely sign in with Google and RSVP for curated events. The system includes real-time event tracking, admin controls for managing responses, and a seamless user interface optimized for mobile and desktop users.

title: SAAS App
description: A Software-as-a-Service application that integrates RSVP functionality and user authentication using Google Sign-In. Designed for scalability, this app offers dynamic event creation, secure data management, and a dashboard for organizers to monitor attendance and engagement metrics.

title: Weekly Hour App for OSJ employees
description: A web application designed for OSJ employees to track their weekly hours. This app features a user-friendly interface for logging hours, generating reports, and integrating with payroll systems. Built with React and Node.js, it ensures secure data handling and real-time updates.
